resources.string: Please fill in the form below in order to get in touch with us about any issues that might have come up through \n use of the app. Or if there is something that you liked, you \n can let us know about that too!
\n \n What is the nature of your email?
No app to send the email was found

This game will test your memory and help you to exercise your brain.

GAMEPLAY

1. The game will present you with 6 cards on the first level and the number of cards will increase after each level. You will be given 6 seconds to memorize the position of the given cards. After 6 seconds all the cards on the screen are flipped.

2. There will always be two cards with same picture and clicking on a card will turn it around.
<big> <p1>3. Pair two cards with same picture to make them disappear. Find all the pairs to complete the game. Have fun!!<p1/><big/>
